s0001: Wei's ancestors were Bi Gong Gao's descendants.
s0002: Bi Gong Gao and Zhou shared the same surname.
s0003: When King Wu attacked Zhou, Gao was enfeoffed at Bi, thus became Bi surname.
s0004: Afterward the enfeoffment was cut off, became commoners, some in central states, some among barbarians.
